TopDownShooter.Utility
Class Model

java.lang.Object
  TopDownShooter.Utility.Model
Direct Known Subclasses:
SelectionModel
public class Model
extends Object

Defines the basic methods needed for the Model portion of a Model-View-Controller design patter. Does not force the implementing class to have a List of Views, which is an implicit requirement. Would be nice to be able to do that.
